message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you would find very valuable. I'm happy to offer it to you for $130.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate the value it holds. I am willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I believe the product's value is closer to my initial offer. How about we meet in the middle at $125?
I see where you're coming from, Alice. I'm still interested in purchasing the product, but I'm only able to offer $120. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the item.
